sentences.en: A 25 mile traffic jam clogged the northbound carriageway of the M6.
sentences.cn: 长达25英里的交通拥堵阻塞了M6号高速公路的北行车道。

sentences.en: Analysts fear the overstretched air traffic control system could reach breaking point.
sentences.cn: 分析人士担心超负荷运转的空中交通管制系统会面临崩溃。

sentences.en: Car horns toot as cyclists dart precariously through the traffic.
sentences.cn: 骑车人危险地在车流中飞速穿行时，汽车喇叭的嘟嘟声响成一片。

sentences.en: He had made a fortune by trafficking young women.
sentences.cn: 他靠贩卖年轻女性发了财。

sentences.en: He was stuck in a line of slow-moving traffic.
sentences.cn: 他陷在缓缓移动的车流里了。

sentences.en: Little traffic was to be seen on the streets.
sentences.cn: 街上车辆很少。

sentences.en: Nerves became severely frayed when air traffic problems delayed the flight.
sentences.cn: 当航班由于空中交通问题而延误时，人们变得异常烦躁起来。

sentences.en: Southbound traffic tailed back for twenty miles on the M5 near Bristol.
sentences.cn: 在布里斯托尔附近的5号高速公路上，南行的车辆排成了绵延20英里的长龙。

sentences.en: The heavy traffic was re-routed past my front door.
sentences.cn: 大量的车流改道经过我家前门。

sentences.en: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.cn: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

sentences.en: The traffic accident had nothing to do with him.
sentences.cn: 这交通事故和他一点关系也没有。

sentences.en: The traffic in this city never lets up, even at night.
sentences.cn: 这个城市道路上的车辆从来就没少过，甚至晚上也不例外。

sentences.en: The traffic on the approach road slowed to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 引路上车辆行驶缓慢。

sentences.en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
sentences.cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

sentences.en: The wide road was blocked solid with traffic that moved along sluggishly.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的马路被缓慢前行的车辆堵得严严实实。

sentences.en: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.cn: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.en: Therefore, for the sake of life, the driver and the pedestrian should obey the traffic regulation as we have only one life.
sentences.cn: 因此，看在生命的份上，司机和行人都应当遵守交通规则因为我们的生命只有一次。

sentences.en: Therefore, it comes to the question, what can we do to reduce traffic accidents?
sentences.cn: 因此，面对这个问题时，我们能做什么来减少交通事故的发生？

sentences.en: They have to wait for clearance from air traffic control.
sentences.cn: 他们需要等空中交通管制人员的放行。

sentences.en: Traffic into London on the M11 was backed up for several miles.
sentences.cn: 进入伦敦的车辆在11号高速公路上堵了好几英里。

sentences.en: Traffic is slow on the westbound carriageway of the M4.
sentences.cn: M4号高速公路西向车道车流行驶缓慢。

phrases.tran_cn: 空中交通，航空运输；飞航
客运，旅客流量；旅客运输
交通状况，运输情况；有效状况

trans.tran_cn: 车流，交通，航线，运输量，信息流，非法买卖
trans.tran_en: the vehicles moving along a road or street
the vehicles moving along a road or street
to take someone to another country and force them to work, for example as a  prostitute
